item.title: Create Github Profile based on README
item.description: Introduction If you visit other peoples GitHub profiles, some people have some fancy pictures, descriptions and stats in their profiles. These are the new GitHub Profile README. They are kind of a hidden new feature and in this article I will show you how to create one and how make it stand out using some cool tricks and tools! First Step: Crate new Github repository You should create a new repository, which name should same as your GitHub’s Username.
